creativeplus.name: Creative+
creativeplus.description: Unleash your creativity with an advanced yet beginner-friendly in-game code editor. Build worlds, design custom mechanics, and craft unique gameplay experiences for others to explore.

skyblockclassic.name: SkyBlock Classic
skyblockclassic.description: The original SkyBlock experience, unchanged for over 8 years. Based on 1.8, it is a true classic with no resets and timeless gameplay.

skyblockrpg.name: SkyBlock RPG
skyblockrpg.description: A modern twist on SkyBlock with RPG elements, updated mechanics, and fresh features. Built on 1.16.5 for a richer survival adventure.

bedwars.name: Bed Wars
bedwars.description: Defend your bed, destroy your enemies, and dominate the battlefield. Play Solo, Doubles, or team up in 3v3v3v3 and 4v4v4v4 modes.

skywars.name: SkyWars
skywars.description: Fast-paced PvP in the sky! Loot chests, battle rivals, and survive to the end in both Solo and Team modes.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: A survival world with a twist â€” featuring shops, a PvP arena, custom items, and more to enhance your vanilla gameplay.

prison.name: Prison
prison.description: Work your way up from the bottom by mining, completing quests, and fighting bosses. Form factions, rise in rank, and conquer the prison world together.
